name: Citadines Namba Osaka
description: This Osaka hotel is located within a 10-minute stroll of Namba Train Station. It is close to Nipponbashi, eateries and shops. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and a concierge. For families Citadines Namba Osaka offers a children's play area. The comfortable rooms at Citadines Namba Osaka include a flat-screen TV, movies-on-demand and an in-room safe. All offer ironing facilities, a bathtub and a desk. Citadines Namba Osaka's restaurants, Restaurant Numero Five and Gion Kitagawa Hanbee Namba, provide guests dinner every evening. Meals can be enjoyed at the in-house restaurant, Kanda Kamekichi. The hotel is ideally located for discovering Osaka with Namba Parks and Visitors Information Center in Namba Osaka within walking distance. The Nihon Kogeikan, Dotonbori Tsuribori and Dotonbori are each within walking distance.Revato

name: W Osaka
description: Live it up in the dynamic heart of Osaka, Japan at W Osaka. Nestled in the fun-filled heart of Shinsaibashi, on Midosuji Boulevard, our vibrant and exciting pet-friendly hotel welcomes you to experience this fab city the W way. Reboot all your social needs amid the electric nightlife scenery of Dotonbori just around the corner. W Osaka seamlessly blends Japan’s celebrated cultural heritage with bold contemporary designs in a rarified milieu of playful chic and boundless luxury. Immerse yourself in super social, delicious dining experiences. Later, kick back in style in one of our extra-comfy hotel rooms and recharge for your next Osaka adventure.Marriott
